abstract: Nikolina Kulidzan Modern Love essay describes being separated from her childhood love by Bosnian war and being reunited 16 years later.
lead_paragraph: They met at age 12. One was Serbian, the other Croatian. Separated by a civil war, they ultimately found their way back to each other.

headline.main: A Kiss Deferred by Civil War

snippet: They met at age 12. One was Serbian, the other Croatian. Separated by a civil war, they ultimately found their way back to each other.
